vsParam:
Wow, there are indeed many books...!
Although the pages got fragile because of the sea breeze...

Ha-ha-ha, what can you do about it...
So, did you find any relevant ones?

Hmm—Please wait.
Let me have a look...

Ah, found it
"Ecology of Punis Living in Eruleum".

Let me see, Tyrant Puni, Tyrant Puni...
Ahhhhhh!?

Wow, what's going on with you, Lydie?
Why did you shout so loudly all of a sudden...

Th-this is the...
Please read this line...

Huh? "Tyrant Puni, one of the Four Ocean Lords of Eruleum,
is extinct due to hunting by pirates". ... Extinct!?

That's right, extinct!
The Tyrant Puni is extinct!

Ah—It's Verbena! She left laughing!
Humph, she must know that it's extinct, right~!!

I think so...
Hmm, what should we do...

It's no use to ask such a question...
The species is already extinct. We have to give up...

... No, there must be a way.
If we use... alchemy...!

You made...
the item that can reverse time before, right?

Huh?
Ah, what's it called? Is it the "Time Reversal"...

That's the one! Because one of my senpais once made
the same thing, it left me with a fairly deep impression.

Hmm, can you give it to me?
I have an idea.

Hmm...?
I see. Lydie, if you say this...

Thank you so much!
It'll be of great help...!
